member.name: M:Sentry.Android.AssemblyReader.AndroidAssemblyReader.TryDecompressLZ4(System.String,System.IO.MemoryStream)
member.summary: The DLL may be LZ4 compressed, see https://github.com/xamarin/xamarin-android/pull/4686 The format is: [ 4 byte magic header ] (XALZ) [ 4 byte header index ] [ 4 byte uncompressed payload length ] [rest: lz4 compressed payload]

member.name: T:Sentry.Android.AssemblyReader.AndroidAssemblyReaderFactory
member.summary: A factory that creates an assembly reader for an Android APK.

member.name: T:Sentry.Android.AssemblyReader.DebugLogger
member.summary: Writes a log message for debugging.
member.param: Arguments for the formatted message string.

member.name: T:Sentry.Android.AssemblyReader.IAndroidAssemblyReader
member.summary: Interface for an object that can read .NET assemblies from an Android APK.

member.name: M:Sentry.Android.AssemblyReader.IAndroidAssemblyReader.TryReadAssembly(System.String)
member.summary: Trys to get a for a given assembly.
member.returns: The reader, or null if the assembly could not be found.
